title: Exploring microbial growth dynamics in a pilot-scale microalgae raceway fed with urban wastewater: Insights into the effect of operational variables

Author(s): Rebecca Nordio, Solaima Belachqer-El Attar, Elisa Clagnan, Ana Sánchez-Zurano, Natalia Pichel, Emanuele Viviano, Fabrizio Adani, José Luis Guzmán, Gabriel Acién
